name: TextVariableInstances
shortdesc: A collection of text variable instances.

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the TextVariableInstance.

method.name: add
method.shortdesc: Creates a text variable instance at the specified location.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The location relative to the reference object or within the containing object. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: reference
parameter.shortdesc: The reference object. Note: Required only when the to parameter specifies before or after. Can accept: TextVariableInstance, XmlStory, TextFrame, Story, Note, Cell, Footnote, Table, TextColumn, TextStyleRange, Text, InsertionPoint, Paragraph, Line, Word, Character or Change. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new TextVariableInstance &#40;Optional)

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the TextVariableInstance with the specified index or name.

parameter.name: index
parameter.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the TextVariableInstance with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the TextVariableInstance with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the TextVariableInstances within the specified range.

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The TextVariableInstance, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: TextVariableInstance, Long Integer or String.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The TextVariableInstance, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: TextVariableInstance, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first TextVariableInstance in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last TextVariableInstance in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle TextVariableInstance in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the TextVariableInstance with the index previous to the specified index.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The index of the TextVariableInstance that follows the desired TextVariableInstance.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the TextVariableInstance whose index follows the specified TextVariableInstance in the collection.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The TextVariableInstance whose index comes before the desired TextVariableInstance.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any TextVariableInstance in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every TextVariableInstance in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the TextVariableInstance.
Returns the TextVariableInstance with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
